direct_enhancements.reason: Both methods handle the retrieval and setting of TCP options, with similar control flow and parameter handling.
Both methods set options, but setPTCPOption handles specific TCP options while setOption handles generic socket options.
Both methods retrieve options, but getOption retrieves generic socket options while getPTCPOption retrieves specific TCP options.
Both methods modify network-related settings, specifically the Maximum Transmission Unit (MTU) and TCP options.
Both methods retrieve network-related settings, specifically the Maximum Transmission Unit (MTU) and TCP options.

enhanced_by.reason: Both methods require initialization of network-related components before setting options.
Environment setup is required before setting TCP options to ensure proper network configuration.
Both methods verify network configurations and handle similar exceptions related to network settings.
